$comment: These tests check the validation behaviour of the complete schema (not subschema 'units')

tests.description: The manually-written instance (a real, complete data file) must pass validation
The instance contains a disallowed property ('unevalPropTest')
The instance is missing the required 'Format' property
The instance is missing the required 'Request' property
The instance is missing the required 'Type' property
The instance is missing all of the required '*ChainLength' properties
The instance is missing all of the required '*NGlycos' properties
The instance is missing all of the required '*CysPositions' properties
The instance is missing all of the required '*DisulfidesIntra' properties
The instance is missing all of the required '*Germline' properties
The instance is missing all of the required '*Range' properties
